general_info.lol_api_key: api key for league of legends

osu.osu_irc_pass: special irc password for osu nick

super_users: admins go here, they by pass all limits and can use all commands even if moderated
general_info.web_listen_ip: IP for machine running bot if web interface
general_info.web_secret: secret key used by website to validate who is connecting (i used rake secret)
